title: Ping Doubled Recently
body: A few days ago i noticed my ping jumped from the 40s to the 90s. I've tried to restart my PC and my modem. Also i have had everything closed in the background but nothing seems to be working. I am not sure what to do so any suggestions are much appreciated!

replies.body:
You are not alone. Went from 50 ping to 95. 

Shaw communications. Live in BC. 

Hope whatever is causing this can be fixed.

Do you reside in Canada? I've noticed some of our Northern Friends have been experiencing some shifts in latency due to some routing issues with some ISP's to our servers. If you'd like, we can take a look at some traceroutes if you grab the networking app called [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/). Simply plug in **104.160.131.1** into the focus address area, then start the trace. After it's run for 5 minutes, export the results as text and paste them in a reply to me.

Let me know if you have any issues running this traceroute.
You're not alone. I'm with Shaw in Edmonton (along with some friends) and we all went from a stable 46 ping to 86 ping overnight. Its almost like Riot moved their server again.
